title: DoubleLine's Ken Shinoda: 'Waller the Frontrunner' For Fed Chair
description: Ken Shinoda, DoubleLine Capital portfolio manager, says rate cuts are possible but likely later this year. He tells Romaine Bostick and Katie Greifeld on “The Close” that Powell is content with current policy and that the Fed will stay on hold until the data changes. (Source: Bloomberg)
